ArbronSummoner.SummonsHint: Drop one or more actors here to configure summons
ArbronSummoner.Config.ActorChangesHint: Use a syntax similar to Active Effects to modify arbitrary data on the summoned actor. The available roll data is that of the summoning actor.
ArbronSummoner.Config.FormulaACHint: Actor's AC calculation must be set to “Natural Armor” or “Flat” to use this formula.
ArbronSummoner.Config.Title: Summon Configuration
ArbronSummoner.Error.NoActor: Original actor could not be found to summon.
ArbronSummoner.Error.NoWarpGate: Summoning requires the Warp Gate module be installed and active.
